Little Office

The Little Office of the Blessed Virgin Mary is an old devotion modelled on the Divine Office or Liturgy of the Hours.

  • Get started

Little Office Booklets

We pray Prime from the Little Office each day, so that is what we are most familiar with. For a while there we were singing Compline too, but since then have gone back to Roman Compline.

The booklets should be available at github.com/veromary/littleOffice.

  • Download the PDF

Here are some recordings.

  • Beata Dei Genetrix, Benedictus
  • Beata Mater, Magnificat
  • Sub Tuum, Nunc Dimittis
  • Regina Caeli - Easter Antiphon - this one to Nunc Dimittis, but same for Benedictus and Magnificat

Here's an article with more recordings from my family
